titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL - The Federal Public Defender for the District of Nebraska is appointed to represent the above named defendant in this matter as to defendant Lester Ferris. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. (JAE)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ferris
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER - This matter is before the Court on the notices of related case 18 in 8:09CR200; (Filing No. 19 in 8:09CR221). The government states the cases arise out of the same incident. Both are assigned to Senior District Court Judge Lyle E. Strom but currently are assigned to different magistrate judges. The Court finds the cases should be designated as related. United States of America v. Robert Taylor (8:09CR221) is referred to Magistrate Judge F.A. Gossett III, for judicial supervision and processing of all pretrial matters in that case as to defendant Lester Ferris. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (KBJ)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER - This matter is before the Court on the notices of related case 18 in 8:09CR200; (Filing No. 19 in 8:09CR221). The government states the cases arise out of the same incident. Both are assigned to Senior District Court Judge Lyle E. Strom but currently are assigned to different magistrate judges. The Court finds the cases should be designated as related. United States of America v. Robert Taylor (8:09CR221) is referred to Magistrate Judge F.A. Gossett III, for judicial supervision and processing of all pretrial matters in that case as to defendant Lester Ferris. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (KBJ)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ferris
titleInfo.subTitle: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture 34 is hereby sustained. The United States is hereby authorized to seize the Remington Model 597,.22 caliber rifle; a Ruger.22 caliber, Model 10/22 rifle; a Beretta CX4 Storm 9mm rifle; a Tikka T3 30-06 caliber rifle; a Romanian SKS rifle 5.45x39mm; a Ruger Model 10-22.22 caliber rifle; and a Russian SKS 7.62x39mm. Defendant's interest in said properties is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture, in which all interests will be addressed as to defendant Lester Ferris. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)(KBJ)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture 34 is hereby sustained. The United States is hereby authorized to seize the Remington Model 597,.22 caliber rifle; a Ruger.22 caliber, Model 10/22 rifle; a Beretta CX4 Storm 9mm rifle; a Tikka T3 30-06 caliber rifle; a Romanian SKS rifle 5.45x39mm; a Ruger Model 10-22.22 caliber rifle; and a Russian SKS 7.62x39mm. Defendant's interest in said properties is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture, in which all interests will be addressed as to defendant Lester Ferris. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)(KBJ)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ferris
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 36 Motion to Amend the Indictment as to Lester Ferris (1). The indictment is amended instanter by removing the language "intent to distribute" and replacing it with the word "of" to indicate defendant was previously convicted of "possession of methamphetamine." Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (JSF)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER granting 36 Motion to Amend the Indictment as to Lester Ferris (1). The indictment is amended instanter by removing the language "intent to distribute" and replacing it with the word "of" to indicate defendant was previously convicted of "possession of methamphetamine." Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (JSF)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Ferris
titleInfo.subTitle: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE - Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture 45 is hereby sustained. All right, title and interest in and to the Remington Model 597,.22 caliber rifle; a Ruger.22 caliber, Model 10/22 rifle; a Beretta CX4 Storm 9mm rifle; a Tikka T3 30-06 caliber rifle; a Romanian SKS rifle 5.45x39mm; a Ruger Model 10-22.22 caliber rifle; and a Russian SKS 7.62x39mm, held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The Remington Model 597,.22 caliber rifle; a Ruger.22 caliber, Model 10/22 rifle; a Beretta CX4 Storm 9mm rifle; a Tikka T3 30-06 caliber rifle; a Romanian SKS rifle 5.45x39mm; a Ruger Model 10-22.22 caliber rifle; and a Russian SKS 7.62x39mm, be, and the same hereby are, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said properties in accordance with law as to defendant Lester Ferris. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM) (KBJ)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE - Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture 45 is hereby sustained. All right, title and interest in and to the Remington Model 597,.22 caliber rifle; a Ruger.22 caliber, Model 10/22 rifle; a Beretta CX4 Storm 9mm rifle; a Tikka T3 30-06 caliber rifle; a Romanian SKS rifle 5.45x39mm; a Ruger Model 10-22.22 caliber rifle; and a Russian SKS 7.62x39mm, held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The Remington Model 597,.22 caliber rifle; a Ruger.22 caliber, Model 10/22 rifle; a Beretta CX4 Storm 9mm rifle; a Tikka T3 30-06 caliber rifle; a Romanian SKS rifle 5.45x39mm; a Ruger Model 10-22.22 caliber rifle; and a Russian SKS 7.62x39mm, be, and the same hereby are, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said properties in accordance with law as to defendant Lester Ferris. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM) (KBJ)
